Package it.polimi.ingsw.customsexceptions

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DeathExceptions  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ArgsNotValidatedException  
    CardNotPossessedException
    Throws this exception if the card is not possesed by the player
    CellNonExistentException
    Throws this exception if the cell is not existent
    DeadPlayerException
    Throws this exception if the player dies by taking more than 10 dmg
    DifferentPlayerNeededException
    Shoot Exceptions: Throws this exception if the weapon needs different playrer
    FrenzyActivatedException  
    InvalidMapTypeException  
    NotAbleToReloadException  
    NotCorrectPlayerNumberException
    Shoot Exceptions: Throws this exception if the number of targets for the shoot with the weapon is not correct
    NotEnoughAmmoException
    Throws this exception if the user hasn't got enough ammo to buy, reload a weapon or pay an effect to shoot
    OverKilledPlayerException  
    OverMaxDmgException  
    OverMaxMarkException  
    PlayerAlreadyDeadException
    Shoot Exceptions: Throws this exception if the player is already dead (you cannot shoot this player)
    PlayerInDifferentCellException
    Shoot Exceptions: Throws this exception if the weapon needs players to be in different cells
    PlayerInSameCellException
    Shoot Exceptions: Throws this exception if the weapon needs player not to be in the same cell
    PlayerNonExistentException  
    PlayerNotSeeableException
    Shoot Exceptions: Throws this exception if the player wanted to be shoot as target cannot be seen
    PrecedentPlayerNeededException
    Shoot Exceptions: Throws this exception if the weapon effects need the same target of the precedent effect
    SeeAblePlayerException
    Shoot Exceptions: Throws this exception if the player has to be not seeable
    UncorrectDistanceException
    Shoot Exceptions: Throws this exception if the shoot distance is not valid
    UncorrectEffectsException
    Shoot Exceptions: Throws this exception if the effects choice for the weapon is not valid
    WeaponNotLoadedException
    Throws this exception if the weapon is not found
